title.en: Nigerian police fire tear gas as protesters gather over separatist leader

excerpt.en: The protesters are seeking the release of Nnamdi Kanu who has been in detention since 2021 on terrorism charges.

title.en: Chad restores ties with wildlife charity linked to Prince Harry

excerpt.en: Chad had terminated its agreement with African Parks after accusing it of failing to curb poaching.

media.alt: After decades of conflict, Somalia is reviving its tourism industry

title.en: After decades of conflict, Somalia is reviving its tourism industry

excerpt.en: Somalia is reviving its tourism industry - one trip at a time. After decades of conflict, hundreds of citizens are joining weekly excursions to explore the country’s natural beauty and cultural…
